title: U.S. Institute of Peace Lights Headquarters Blue for U.N. Anniversary (US Institute of Peace)
text: ( Source : US Institute of Peace ) USIP will join -from Australia's Sydney Opera House to Egypt 's Great Pyramids , to New York's Empire State Building-that will be illuminated in ' U.N. blue' to honor the United Nations ' founding and its
